entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 18
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 2 BELOW THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 9 ABOVE
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 8 BELOW

SNOW SHOWERS
SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 3 TO 5 INCHES
COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 13
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW

SNOW SHOWERS

COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 12
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 1 BELOW

CLOUDY
SNOW SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
NEW MODERATE SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS AROUND 16
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
